summary.what: YYYY/MM/DD directory layout and multi-branch merge tests
summary.why: Flat directory won't scale at 100+ commits/day; daily buckets provide resilience while staying sparse. Integration tests prove file-per-entry storage is inherently merge-safe.
summary.how: EntryDateDir parses date from entry ID, WalkDir replaces ReadDir, atomicWrite extracted for complexity, recursive cleanup in uninstall. 14 integration tests cover merge scenarios.
